body: someone should file an issue for this problematic issue

NVM cannot repro. Closing.

I realized there's a Settings button for that.
Still it could be slightly lower as a default.
Regarding this Settings button, some words get cut off, so all I know is that the settings are "Thre..., Sten..., and Radi...," and had to guess which one to use.
Too much information. If these still exist, refile as specific bugs.
Old. Closing. Refile if still an issue.

1. This is expected behavior. Performance tuning should be a separate milestone task.
2. Please use this template when filing bugs: https://github.com/kinetecharts/openPerform/blob/master/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md
